text: Charles Oscar Hartenstein (May 26, 1942 – October 2, 2021) was an American professional baseball relief pitcher. He played in Major League Baseball (MLB) for five different teams between 1966 and 1977. He played for the Chicago Cubs (1965–68), Pittsburgh Pirates (1969–70), St. Louis Cardinals (1970), Boston Red Sox (1970) and Toronto Blue Jays (1977). Hartenstein died on October 2, 2021 at the age of 79.Charles Oscar Hartenstein Jr. ==References== ==Other websites== *Chuck Hartenstein at SABR (Baseball BioProject) Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Pittsburgh Pirates players Category:St. Louis Cardinals players Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Toronto Blue Jays players Category:Sportspeople from Austin, Texas
title: Chuck Hartenstein
